ygData.subject: Re: training points after jewelry is maxed
ygData.msgSnippet: save them for higher levels. at 16 you get research, which CAN be valuable if you do it right (refer to the latest post on berserker strength sell). also at
ygData.messageBody:
save them for higher levels. at 16 you get research, which CAN be valuable
if you do it right (refer to the latest post on berserker strength sell).
also at lvl 20 you get to specialize (not sure what that means) as well as
dodge (which can be a good thing too).

if ya wanna spend the money now, put em in bind wound. i stopped after
reaching skill lvl 10, i dont know how owrth it it would be to keep going
with it...


Qorona of the Volition Guild, 14th lvl enchanter


>
>So what does every spend their training points in AFTER its maxed at 21??
>
>languages are learned easily enough, so not there....
>melee skills go up through use easily so not there....
>
>Thanks for your thoughts...
>
>Fistlebane
